title: Longing For....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Ah.... Maru lost count of the stitches zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Let me see. Hmm.... Okay, count the stitches from this spot here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you, Ayumu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, you’re welcome. But why do you suddenly want to start knitting?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You see, Maru wants a lap blanket for reading. Maru saw a scene that uses it in a book Maru read the other day, so Maru wants to try it too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>A lap blanket, huh~? That might be tricky!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Is it too hard for beginners....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>No, it’ll be fine. I’ll help you, so let’s do our best to finish it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>We might be giving it our all, but let’s also take our time making it, alright♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
